alert.note: Alert for Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:42PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SIMPSON...NORTHERN LAWRENCE...SOUTHEASTERN COPIAH AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 442 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oma, or 12 miles north of Monticello, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... New Hebron and Shivers around 500 PM CDT. Pinola around 510 PM CDT. Clem around 520 PM CDT. Sanatorium around 530 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
